post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
제 친구가 프로그래머를 찾네요.
아래 내용을 보시고 qualify되시면 연락 주세요.
저를 convince 시킬 수 있으시면 됩니다.
이메일 -> khboo@hotmail.com

==========================================

Hi Ki,

Happy new year ! I have a friend who has started up a company that develops mobile applications (ie. applications that run on symbian, J2ME, Win CE, etc).

They are looking for key people to help them build out their product strategy.  If you know some acquaintances who would be interested, let me know.

thanks
Gordon
post.title: mobile application 프로그래머 구합니다.
